cheatsheet.title: Defining a Symbian OS App TRK Launch Configuration

intro.description: Read the following information to create a Launch Configuration for Run Mode Debugging.

item.title: Defining a Launch Configuration
item.description: Verify that the project's debug configuration is setup for Symbian OS debugging.

item.title: Launch Configuration Overview for On-device Debugging
item.description: Read additional information about launch configurations and define parameters in Main, Debugger, Connection, File Transfer, and Installation panes.
